Export.CSP: <script language="CACHE" method="OnPreHTTP" returntype="%Boolean"> set shortFileName = %request.Get("shortFileName") set longFileName = %request.Get("longFileName") set %response.ContentType = "application/vnd.ms-excel" do %response.SetHeader("content-disposition","filename="_shortFileName) do %response.SetHeader("CACHE-CONTROL","max-age=0") quit $$$OK </script><server> set file = ##class(%FileCharacterStream).%New() do file.LinkToFile(longFileName) do file.OutputToDevice() set ^CacheTemp("debug","outputFile.csp")=$listbuild(shortFileName,longFileName,file) </server>
